verses.verse: A Psalm <WH4210> of David <WH1732>. I will sing <WH7891> <WH8799> of mercy <WH2617> and judgment <WH4941>: unto thee, O YY <WH3068>, will I sing <WH2167> <WH8762>.

I will behave myself wisely <WH7919> <WH8686> in a perfect <WH8549> way <WH1870>. O when wilt thou come <WH935> <WH8799> unto me? I will walk <WH1980> <WH8691> within <WH7130> my house <WH1004> with a perfect <WH8537> heart <WH3824>.

I will set <WH7896> <WH8799> no wicked <WH1100> thing <WH1697> before mine eyes <WH5869>: I hate <WH8130> <WH8804> the work <WH6213> <WH8800> of them that turn aside <WH7750>; it shall not cleave <WH1692> <WH8799> to me.
A froward <WH6141> heart <WH3824> shall depart <WH5493> <WH8799> from me: I will not know <WH3045> <WH8799> a wicked <WH7451> person.

Whoso privily <WH5643> slandereth <WH3960> <WH8764> <WH8675> <WH3960> <WH8781> his neighbour <WH7453>, him will I cut off <WH6789> <WH8686>: him that hath an high <WH1362> look <WH5869> and a proud <WH7342> heart <WH3824> will not I suffer <WH3201> <WH8799>.

Mine eyes <WH5869> shall be upon the faithful <WH539> <WH8737> of the land <WH776>, that they may dwell <WH3427> <WH8800> with me: he that walketh <WH1980> <WH8802> in a perfect <WH8549> way <WH1870>, he shall serve <WH8334> <WH8762> me.

He that worketh <WH6213> <WH8802> deceit <WH7423> shall not dwell <WH3427> <WH8799> within <WH7130> my house <WH1004>: he that telleth <WH1696> <WH8802> lies <WH8267> shall not tarry <WH3559> <WH8735> in my sight <WH5869>.

I will early <WH1242> destroy <WH6789> <WH8686> all the wicked <WH7563> of the land <WH776>; that I may cut off <WH3772> <WH8687> all wicked <WH205> doers <WH6466> <WH8802> from the city <WH5892> of the YY <WH3068>.
